Name

GetPropertyType

Description

Vix_GetPropertyType(VixHandle handle,
                    VixPropertyID propertyID,
                    VixPropertyType *propertyType);
HRESULT
GetPropertyType([in] LONG propertyID,
                [out] LONG* propertyType,
                [out,retval] ULONGLONG* error);

Given a property ID, this method returns the type of that property.

Parameters

propertyID
A property ID. See below for valid values.
propertyType
The type of the data stored by the property.
error
This method returns VIX_OK if it succeeded.

Return Value

HRESULT

Remarks

This method identifies the data type of a property. For a list of property data types, refer to the Types Reference topic.

Side Effects

None.

Requirements

VixCOM.h, since VMware Workstation 6.0.
